trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of cells in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> objects are retrieved by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> 物件藉由擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that owns the collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> class.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to add to the collection.
Adds a cell to the collection.
The position in which to insert the new element.
Use this method to populate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> with cells before you add the row to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來填入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>之前加入的資料列的資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您加入資料列至控制項時，它一律包含的資料格數目會符合在控制項中，資料行數目，所以這個方法不會再很有用。

trans-unit.source: The row that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-
<paramref name="dataGridViewCell" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
The array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> objects to add to the collection.
Adds an array of cells to the collection.
Use this method to populate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> with cells before you add the row to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來填入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>之前加入的資料列的資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您加入資料列至控制項時，它一律包含的資料格數目會符合在控制項中，資料行數目，所以這個方法不會再很有用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridViewCells" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The row that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-
At least one value in <paramref name="dataGridViewCells" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
At least one cell in <paramref name="dataGridViewCells" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
-or-
At least two values in <paramref name="dataGridViewCells" /> are references to the same <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
Clears all cells from the collection.
Use this method to alter the collection before you add the containing row to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，以變更集合，然後再新增包含的資料列於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您加入資料列至控制項時，它一律包含的資料格數目會符合在控制項中，資料行數目，所以這個方法不會再很有用。

trans-unit.source: The row that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
Occurs when the collection is changed.
The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> named `DataGridViewCellCollection1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>名為`DataGridViewCellCollection1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to locate in the collection.
Determines whether the specified cell is contained in the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="dataGridViewCell" /> is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The destination array to which the contents will be copied.
The index of the element in <c>array</c> at which to start copying.
Copies the entire collection of cells into an array at a specified location within the array.
The cell to locate in the collection.
Returns the index of the specified cell.
The zero-based index of the value of <paramref name="dataGridViewCell" /> parameter, if it is found in the collection; otherwise, -1.
The zero-based index at which to place <c>dataGridViewCell</c>.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to insert.
Inserts a cell into the collection at the specified index.
Use this method to alter the collection before you add the containing row to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，以變更集合，然後再新增包含的資料列於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您加入資料列至控制項時，它一律包含的資料格數目會符合在控制項中，資料行數目，所以這個方法不會再很有用。

trans-unit.source: The row that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-
<paramref name="dataGridViewCell" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
Gets or sets the item at the provided location.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> class.
The zero-based index of the cell to get or set.
Gets or sets the cell at the provided index location.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> stored at the given index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />儲存在指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see langword="null" />.
The specified cell when setting this property already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-
The specified cell when setting this property already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
-or-
<paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than the number of cells in the collection.
The name of the column in which to get or set the cell.
Gets or sets the cell in the column with the provided name.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> stored in the column with the given name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />儲存在具有指定名稱資料行。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnName" /> does not match the name of any columns in the control.
The specified value when setting this property is <see langword="null" />.
The specified cell when setting this property already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-
The specified cell when setting this property already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> objects.
<see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.CollectionChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to remove from the collection.
Removes the specified cell from the collection.
Use this method to alter the collection before you add the containing row to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，以變更集合，然後再新增包含的資料列於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您加入資料列至控制項時，它一律包含的資料格數目會符合在控制項中，資料行數目，所以這個方法不會再很有用。

trans-unit.source: The row that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
<paramref name="cell" /> could not be found in the collection.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to be removed.
Removes the cell at the specified index.
Use this method to alter the collection before you add the containing row to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，以變更集合，然後再新增包含的資料列於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您加入資料列至控制項時，它一律包含的資料格數目會符合在控制項中，資料行數目，所以這個方法不會再很有用。

trans-unit.source: The row that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
Copies the elements of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.
The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> 中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" />.

An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that can be used to iterate through the collection.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to add to the collection.
Adds an item to the collection.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.

-or-
<paramref name="value" /> represents a cell that already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
The specified value when setting this property is <see langword="null" />.
The specified cell when setting this property already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
-or-
The specified cell when setting this property already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
-or-
<paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than the number of cells in the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to remove from the collection.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the collection.
Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您加入資料列至控制項時，它一律包含的資料格數目會符合在控制項中，資料行數目，所以這個方法不會再很有用。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
The row that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
<paramref name="cell" /> could not be found in the collection.
The position at which to remove the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> at the specified index.
Once you add the row to a control, the number of cells it contains always matches the number of columns in the control, so this method is no longer useful.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您加入資料列至控制項時，它一律包含的資料格數目會符合在控制項中，資料行數目，所以這個方法不會再很有用。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The row that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
